description:
Approval of details of elevations and facing materials persuant to conditions 3 and 4 of planning permission dated 02.09.97 (ref:97/0791) namely:- 

 Building 1:-  'Freshfield Lane' 1st quality facing brick;            -  zinc flame-sprayed steel with concrete inserts               for projecting bays;            -  powdercoated aluminium windows, RAL colour               7024;            -  stainless steel balustrades and plant room               cladding;            -  York stone paving slabs;            -  Porphyry 90mm. stone sett paving. 

 Building 2:-  'Lincoln Red' facing brick;            -  zinc cladding;            -  timber balcony handrails and screens;            -  window frames colour RAL 7015            -  translucent glass to oriel windows;            -  metal cladding to projecting bays, column               bases, capitals and parapets;         all as per sample panel supplied. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  326/A151C, A152D, A153C, A6003A,                         A6029A, 299/A162D, 163D, 165B, 167B,                         168E, 169F, 8657/2/AS/2122-2,                         8657/2/SK/2200B
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVES 

 (1) This approval does not include landscaping details (Condition 5) except insofar as the use of the paving materials detailed above. 

 (2) The Council wish to give further consideration to details of mortar courses by means of brick panels erected on site when these are available.
